d1e3.d: The Cellar offers a lot of great menu items to dip into ranch... but the ranch isn't anything to write home about.

d1e10.d: Great service, good food, average ranch.

d1e17.d: Bull & Bones does not have terrible ranch! Bull & Bones also does not have great ranch.

d1e24.d: Sharkey's ranch is maybe not as comparable to Ken's Buttermilk as others, but it's still a delicious choice.

d1e31.t: Where Is The Best Ranch in Blacksburg?
d1e31.d: Almost every restaurant in Blacksburg serves ranch... but that doesn't mean every restaurant in Blacksburg is good at it.

d1e39.d: The ranch at PK's Bar and Grill is exceptional. Extremely close if not identical to Ken's Buttermilk.
